welcome_message_title: Welcome to Sao Felix do Araguaia
welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sao Felix do Araguaia, a charming city known for its beautiful scenery and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy our vibrant culture and stunning landscapes during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sao Felix Do Araguaia Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Sao Felix Do Araguaia Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Dedicated to domestic flights for low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Newly built terminal for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
